alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 7:00PM EDT until August 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Columbiana County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Carroll County in east central Ohio... Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... West central Beaver County in western Pennsylvania... Hancock County in northern West Virginia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Minerva to near Carrollton to 7 miles southeast of Farmerstown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, East Liverpool, Uhrichsville, Wellsville, Carrollton, Freeport, Toronto, Calcutta, Newcomerstown, Minerva, Ohioville, Lisbon, Dennison, Midland, Chester, Industry, New Cumberland, Augusta, and Salineville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 65 and 82. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio...western Pennsylvania...and northern West Virginia. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
